ContextDirectory: PLEASE_CONFIGURE: Path to search for metadata files. Supports both relative (e.g., ../../src/Services) and absolute paths (e.g., D:\Projects\src\Services or /home/user/projects/src/Services)
OutputDirectory: PLEASE_CONFIGURE: Path to output metadata JSON files. Supports both relative (e.g., ../../output) and absolute paths (e.g., D:\Projects\output or /home/user/projects/output)
